Articles.Content: so as Squad are adding female kerbals i decided i would do my idea of what they should look like

Nice pic, and a cool take on the gender. Plus I promise I'm not going to say anything whatsoever about female pilots and side-seat flying. Not a thing.... absolutely nothing I tell you!

Hair is definitely going to be important. If all the Kermins have crew cuts I don't think it'll have the same effect.
That's why I gave her a hair covering. She needs hair but it is kept out of the way in low gravity environments
